mod.description: How far you can zoom out in arcade mode in meters

mod.name: Harpoon
mod.description: by lenya69

mod.name: Xft's Integrated DamageLogs (Hitlog Requires XVM)
mod.description: Keeps a list of who shot you and for how much

mod.name: Damagelog by GambitER
mod.description: Keeps a list of who shot you and for how much. Press alt to see the player name.

mod.name: Battle Assistant
mod.description: Enables an isometric view from Arty.

mod.name: ExtraAimInfo
mod.description: arty only config only shows@-aimtime@-accuracy@-flight time@old style places it where it was when the mod first came out

mod.name: Autoaim indication

config.name: lock shell travel distance when enemy dissapeared add-on

mod.description: kaeptn configs@http://forum.worldoftanks.eu/index.php?/topic/441413-0917-autoaim-indicationaddins-no-proximity-snapping-for-autoaim-but/page__st__1580__pid__13686506#entry13686506
mod.updateComment: Latest update locks onto a target when manually highlighted, so it is legal now

mod.name: Number Indicator of Armor Penetration ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) (not PMOD)
mod.description: Shows a number of chance of penetration. The number is calculated by effective armor minus gun alpha.@Negative number means likely to bounce.@Positive number means likely to pierce.

mod.name: TessuMod, WOT/Teamspeak integration
mod.description: A modification for integrating TeamSpeak into Garage and Battle.

mod.name: SpotMessanger

config.name: active at start, deactivate with F11
inactive at start, activate with F11

mod.description: Sends a chat message that you are spotted in a grid square, along with the "Help!" command

mod.name: LightMod by Polyacov-Yury
mod.description: MUST HAVE ADVANCED GRAPHICS SETTINGS FOR THIS TO WORK!

mod.name: Bullet Damage Indicators
mod.description: Changes the look of the damage indicators when you are shot

mod.name: Inbattle current rating calculation by Ekspoint
mod.description: Kaeptn Config@http://forum.worldoftanks.eu/index.php?/topic/561169-091703-inbattle-wn8-calculator-eff-damage-updated-02022017/page__st__40__pid__12646652#entry12646652@Shows your current stats ingame. Live updates.

mod.name: Colored penetration and ricochets on tanks
mod.description: Allows you to see where to penetrate the enemy better, or see where the enemy is penetrating you

mod.name: Max Farplane mod
mod.description: Settings to remove the distance fog and/or enable more map visibility. Does not increase view of seeing enemy tanks.

mod.name: ATAC
mod.description: A notification if an enemy is near you.

mod.name: Loading Video
mod.description: weeb video@http://forum.worldoftanks.com/index.php?/topic/398152-0917-girls-und-panzer-the-new-mod-collection/@MLG video@http://forum.worldoftanks.eu/index.php?/topic/476721-097-gtos-mlg-mod-continued-by-aimdrol-s3al-dog-in-tenks-especially-rudy/

mod.name: Hitmarker by Aimdrol
mod.description: Shows a CoD style hitmarker whenever you penetrate an enemy tank

mod.name: Loading Animation
mod.description: Replaces the standard loading animation circle@Illuminati - http://forum.worldoftanks.eu/index.php?/topic/476721-097-gtos-mlg-mod-continued-by-aimdrol-s3al-dog-in-tenks-especially-rudy/@OMC -

mod.name: Mastery Badges
mod.description: Changes the mastery badges to CoD style badges

mod.name: MLG Glasses by Aimdrol
mod.description: Enables MLG glasses to drop down on your tank when you are in a light tank and an enemy bounces off of you. Enemy caliber gun must be > 90 mm

mod.name: Illuminati Companion by Aimdrol
mod.description: Show an illuminati pyramid "protecting" your tank after your death. (Or during the battle)

mod.name: Marks Of Excellence
mod.description: Modifies the standard Marks of Excellence on the gun barrels@Aimdrol mods: http://forum.worldoftanks.eu/index.php?/topic/476721-097-gtos-mlg-mod-continued-by-aimdrol-s3al-dog-in-tenks-especially-rudy/@VoPV mods: http://www.awolf.eu/load/mods_world_of_tanks/mods_settings/jaskrawe_odznaki_bieglosci_od_vopv_0_9_14/6-1-0-2313

mod.name: Consumables
mod.description: Modifies the standard equipment and consumables icons. Some modify the names as well.

mod.name: Battle Observer (HP pools)

config.name: Enable Damage Log (turn off xvm's and/or don't get other damage logs)
Enable Players info panel (when you press left alt)

mod.description: Shows the total HP of each team at the top of the screen.

mod.name: SafeShot

config.name: block wasted shots (shots fired into the air, ground, etc.)
send team damage message in chat

mod.description: legal info@http://forum.worldoftanks.eu/index.php?/topic/599621-wg-support-safeshot-is-illegal/page__st__20__pid__13403197#entry13403197@prevents you from shooting your gun to hit allies/dead tanks/etc.

mod.name: WG FM Radio
mod.description: Like Pandora internet radio, but in your game, with a configurable gui settings window

mod.name: Aslains gold premium tanks
mod.description: Gold premium tank icons for the garage

mod.name: BalCalcMod
mod.description: The mod is designed to remedy the situation where it is impossible to aim above the hill. (Overshooting)

mod.name: Session Statistics by Tomonik
mod.description: Shows your statistics for your tanks session in the notifications area of your garage

mod.name: YasenKrasen session statistics
mod.description: Shows your statistics for your tanks session in the notifications area of your garage

mod.name: Relhax
mod.description: Replaces all crew sounds with hilarious out-of-context sound bytes from people of the RELIC gaming community

mod.description: Plays certain sounds for when you get a certain number of kills in the game.
